The Milton S. Eisenhower
Symposium on Violence,

broadcast nationally by the
Broadcasting
Public
Laboratory, the educational
TV network.

President Emeritus of

the President about the policy

Symposium.

organization or read its literature. The rationale of
university private property has too long impeded independent thought. It is one thing to prohibit solicitation

forbid fundraising, petitioning and distributing
literature by outside organizations.

literature by outside organizations.
